problem_definition.command_line: time shallow_water adjoint_A.swml; time shallow_water adjoint_B.swml; time shallow_water adjoint_C.swml

variables.variable:
import glob from fluidity_tools import stat_parser
def time_integral(filename, field): stat = stat_parser(filename) values = stat["Fluid"][field]["max"]
J = sum(values) return J
files_forward = glob.glob("wave_[A-C].stat") field_forward = 'J' time_integrals_forward = [time_integral(file, field_forward) for file in sorted(files_forward)] print 'time_integrals_forward', time_integrals_forward

import glob from fluidity_tools import stat_parser
def time_integral(filename, field): stat = stat_parser(filename) values = stat["Fluid"][field]["max"]
J = sum(values) return J
files_adjoint = glob.glob("wave_[A-C]_adjoint_integral_eta_t1.stat") field_adjoint = 'adj_J' time_integrals_adjoint = [time_integral(file, field_adjoint) for file in sorted(files_adjoint)] print 'time_integrals_adjoint', time_integrals_adjoint

pass_tests.test: for i in range(len(time_integrals_adjoint)): assert(abs(time_integrals_adjoint[i] - time_integrals_forward[i]) < 1e-10)
